game.name: Bite Night: Dine or Die
game.categories: Single-player, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Bite Night: Dine or Die is a First-Person horror thriller where you play as a diner worker trying to solve the murders of your customers along side your best friend Vamp.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bite Night: Dine or Die is a First-Person horror thriller where you play as a diner worker trying to solve the murders of your customers along side your best friend Vamp.
